question: You have recently been on a vacation in a foreign country and stayed at a home-stay, you have realised that you have misplaced an expensive wristwatch and cannot find it.Write a letter to the family you stayed with. In your letter:Give details of your stayDescribe your wristwatchIf found how they could return it to you.
text: I am writing this letter to bring to your notice that I have misplaced my RADO wristwatch during my stay on the recent trip to Switzerland.

Firstly, I am Neha Jaiswal and I have stayed at your condo apartment from 25th-29th Mar2022 where I forgot my watch which has always been very precious to me as it was gifted by my late grandfather and was his last memory to me. Also, the watch was embedded with real American diamonds and was very expensive. It has a golden strap and my name is embedded on the backside.

I remember  I had left the watch near the pool play area after we had a ravishing experience at the pool party. I would request you to look for the watch and courier it back to me at the below address.
Looking forward to your co-operation and prompt response.
